item.description:
Join us for dinner at Zendo Asian Bistro (www.zendobistro.com).  From their website:  Zendo carefully melds the finest tastes and styles that traditional Chinese, Japanese, Thai and Vietnamese cuisines have to offer into original fusion dishes created by its renowned chefs using only the freshest materials.

 After dinner, we can head over to the Next Page Cafe, East Weymouth to see The Alumni (please rsvp separately).

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dinner - Zendo Asian Bistro (Hingham)
